original_text: For she sitteth at the door of her house, on a seat in the high places of the city,
korean_text: 자기 집 문에 앉으며 성읍 높은 곳에 있는 자리에 앉아서

sentences.original_text: For she sitteth at the door of her house
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자기 집 문에 앉아 있으며

sentences.original_text: on a seat in the high places of the city
